The functionality of the provided Node.js code is to define and export a function named `createTransformer`. This function, when called, returns a new instance of a `TsJestTransformer` class, which is imported from a module named `./ts-jest-transformer`. The purpose of this code is to encapsulate the creation of `TsJestTransformer` instances, likely for use in a testing environment that involves transforming TypeScript code within the Jest framework.

```javascript
"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const { TsJestTransformer } = require("./ts-jest-transformer");

function createTransformer() {
    return new TsJestTransformer();
}

exports.createTransformer = createTransformer;
```
